title: Google\Cloud\Datastore\Admin\V1\DatastoreFirestoreMigrationMetadata
name: DatastoreFirestoreMigrationMetadata
description:
Metadata for Datastore to Firestore migration operations.

The DatastoreFirestoreMigration operation is not started by the end-user via an explicit "creation" method. This is an intentional deviation from the LRO design pattern. This singleton resource can be accessed at: "projects/{project_id}/operations/datastore-firestore-migration"

Generated from protobuf message google.datastore.admin.v1.DatastoreFirestoreMigrationMetadata

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.migration_state
params.description: The current state of migration from Cloud Datastore to Cloud Firestore in Datastore mode.

params.name: data.migration_step
params.description: The current step of migration from Cloud Datastore to Cloud Firestore in Datastore mode.
